priority_ranked_signals.title: US Supreme Court Rules Trump Reciprocal Tariffs Unlawful
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Unprecedented judicial nullification of executive tariff authority reshapes global trade architecture. Direct trillion-KRW impact on Korean exporters, but Trump's new 15% tariff creates continued uncertainty. This is a genuine discontinuity in US trade policy framework.

priority_ranked_signals.title: US-Iran Military Confrontation Risk at Peak
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Largest US Middle East military deployment since 2003. 90% clash probability within weeks. Hormuz Strait closure would devastate global oil supply. Direct impact on Korean energy security and economy.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Samsung/SK Hynix Begin World-First HBM4 Mass Production
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: World-first HBM4 production 3-4 months ahead of schedule. 2.4x bandwidth improvement enables next-gen AI. Positions Korea as indispensable in global AI supply chain. Strategic alignment with NVIDIA Rubin launch.

priority_ranked_signals.title: AMD-Meta $60B AI Chip Deal Disrupts NVIDIA Monopoly
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Largest single AI chip deal in history signals structural shift in AI infrastructure market. Meta's multi-vendor strategy breaks NVIDIA monopoly. 10% equity option is unprecedented. Impacts Korean semiconductor positioning.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Korea Enters Super-Aged Society: 65+ Exceeds 20%
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: World's fastest transition to super-aged society (7.3 years vs Japan's 10). Working-age population to shrink by 10M by 2044. TFR at 0.81 is lowest globally. This megatrend fundamentally reshapes all policy domains.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Coupang Data Breach: 33.67 Million Accounts Compromised
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Largest Korean data breach affecting 65% of population. ISDS arbitration by US investors adds international dimension. Exposes critical gaps in Korean platform security and data governance. Precursor to tighter data regulation.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Agentic AI Year: Korean Enterprises Navigate Paradigm Shift
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Transition from tool-AI to autonomous agent-AI represents a fundamental paradigm shift. Korean AI Ethics Act enforcement creates unique regulatory environment. Balancing innovation speed with compliance is a critical strategic challenge.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Korea-Brazil Strategic Partnership: 67 Years in the Making
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: First upgrade in 67 years of diplomatic ties. 4-year action plan spans 10 fields. Mercosur trade agreement interest opens Latin American markets. Strategic diversification away from US/China dependency.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Next-Gen Distributed Power Grid Plan: Energy Transition Accelerates
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Shift from centralized to distributed power grid is a structural transformation of Korea's energy infrastructure. Solar/Wind Income Villages create citizen engagement. 20MW+ offshore turbine development represents scale breakthrough.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Former President Yoon Life Sentence: Constitutional Accountability
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: First life sentence for a sitting president over insurrection. Sets constitutional precedent for executive accountability. International recognition (Amnesty International). Impacts political culture and democratic norms.

priority_ranked_signals.title: AI-Quantum Computing Convergence in Drug Discovery
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: AI proposes candidates, quantum computers verify. Ecosystem competition replacing hardware competition. Long-term paradigm shift in pharmaceutical R&D with massive healthcare implications.

priority_ranked_signals.title: OPCON Transfer Roadmap: Korean Military Sovereignty Acceleration
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: FOC verification by October 2026 is the most concrete OPCON timeline yet. Shifts Korea-US alliance dynamic. Increases Korean military autonomy at a critical geopolitical juncture.

priority_ranked_signals.title: AI Ethics and Safety Basic Act Enforcement Begins
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: First comprehensive AI ethics law in Korea. Mandates transparency, fairness, accountability. Sets precedent for Asian AI governance. Companies must restructure AI development practices for compliance.

priority_ranked_signals.title: 1.68 Trillion KRW ICT R&D Budget: NPU and 6G Focus
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: 24.3% YoY increase signals aggressive government AI/semiconductor push. Focus on escaping GPU dependency through domestic NPU is strategically significant for reducing reliance on NVIDIA.

priority_ranked_signals.title: Japan's Economic Security Diplomacy: Regional Power Shift
priority_ranked_signals.rationale: Takaichi regime's economic security diplomacy reshapes regional dynamics. Supply chain weaponization and tech export controls directly affect Korea-Japan tech competition. New paradigm in Northeast Asian geopolitics.

indicators: Military deployment scale not seen since 2003
tipping_point_alerts.evidence: Both signals represent potential systemic disruptions with immediate cascading effects
Critical thresholds crossed or structural market shifts underway
Emerging trends approaching critical mass but not yet at tipping point
Notable developments but within expected trend trajectories
